page.title: 09Biography
page.content: 1.Sir Edmund Stockdale, principal land owner was Lord Mayor of London in 1959-1960 2.Thomas Henry Wyatt senior was the architect for the Adelphi Theatre in London and the Guards Barracks in Hyde Park as well as the rebuilding of the Church of St.Lawrence in Weston Patrick in 1868. His son Thomas inherited Weston Corbett House on the northern border of the study area in 1859 and the Wyatt family have lived in the village ever since. Six houses in Weston Patrick are still occupied by members of the family. 3.Edward Lear, limerick writer and cartoonist visited the Wyatts and gave a picture to Thomas Bone the village carpenter.
